Posts.Content: Hi,Violet.I get back spasm,s still after I had chemo? Did you have it? It was after the injections to stop my white cells dropping too low during it.

Posts.Content: Hi Summerholiday-good name :@)  I had a terrible back pain when I had my first ever injection and then 2 years later still get the odd one-bearable after everything else tho
